Acer V276HLbd 27 LED VGA DVI Monitor
Essential Series monitors feature Acer eColor technology for striking visuals, and Acer ComfyView innovations that reduce glare to deliver most-comfortable viewing. These sturdy monitors also have a wide array of ports, so you can connect many types of devices and do more at once. In addition, they utilize eco-friendly features to save power and money.
display type: LED-backlit LCD monitor / TFT active matrix
